title: Greece supports a prompt Cyprus solution, Pavlopoulos says
text:
Previous Post

Efforts for a Cyprus settlement to continue with determination, President Anastasiades assures in New Year address
meta_description: Greek President of the Hellenic Republic Prokopis Pavlopoulos said that Greece supports the prompt solution of the Cyprus Problem, with full respect of the international and the European law. In...
